org.apache.taverna.server.master.rest

Interface TavernaServerListenersREST.TavernaServerListenerREST

  • Enclosing interface:
    TavernaServerListenersREST

    @RolesAllowed(value="ROLE_tavernauser")
public static interface TavernaServerListenersREST.TavernaServerListenerREST
    This represents a single event listener attached to a workflow run.
    Author:
    Donal Fellows
    See Also:
    TavernaServerListenersREST, TavernaServerListenersREST.Property
